original_text: The lowest story was five cubits broad, the middle one was six cubits broad, and the third was seven cubits broad. For around the outside of the house he made offsets on the wall in order that the supporting beams should not be inserted into the walls of the house.
korean_text: 하층 다락의 너비는 다섯 규빗이요 중층 다락의 너비는 여섯 규빗이요 셋째 층 다락의 너비는 일곱 규빗이라 성전의 벽 바깥으로 돌아가며 턱을 내어 골방 들보들로 성전의 벽에 박히지 아니하게 하였으며

sentences.original_text: The lowest story was five cubits broad
the middle one was six cubits broad
and the third was seven cubits broad
For around the outside of the house
he made offsets on the wall
the supporting beams should not be inserted
into the walls of the house
